ygData.subject: Re: Guild- leader
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh I know someone who start later than me and now lvl 14 liao, somemore he is playing one of the most difficult class - wiz, so bad that I sometime think that
ygData.messageBody:
Heh I know someone who start later than me and now lvl 14 liao, somemore he
is playing one of the most difficult class - wiz, so bad that I sometime
think that we wiz is one of the weakest in the begining, after enchanters
(who even more suai as they spell r mainly buffing, their summoning is the
most lousy amd their offensive spells also worst of the magery class).
Unlike warrior or hyrid classes, wiz really have a hard time finding a
team, not even to mention soloing. I have to admit wiz from lvl 1-7 is
simply a burden, only at lvl 8 with new spells we managed to get back some
'face', hehe.

Also in order to hunt as a local team, we need to get everyone on the list
to achieve similar lvls, preferably not more than 3 lvl gap, else it's
kinda fruitless for the much lower lvl members to hunt with the higher lvl
ones.

Hey I'm still at Greater Faydark, I hope to get to lvl 11 (1.8 bubble to
go) tonight and hopefully lvl 12 during the weekend. If u guys know any
cleric/tank/ranger/druid friends who are around lvl 10 & hunt around
greater faydark or butcherblock? Pls introduce to me for hunting group ;)
TIA

Ziltus

On Friday, June 04, 1999 1:02 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> wah, spare me ah, I know I raise lvl fastest. but I will be very bad
at
> guild master stuff. As we had said, any1 can be the gm as it's just an
> informal guild so that the Singaporeans can meet up and as it's school
> holiday now, Entreri will make a good choice. heheh. Let him come up with
3
> guild names and we vote on it. Fair? Since he's nominated for gm, he can
> decide what 3 names he thinks is okie, we vote on it. Then when guild
name
> is decided, we can then do up a nice charter for the guild then submit
liao.
> So, Kenven okie rite? ^_^

fix
